title: GemCaveToken
author: GemCaveToken
content: Before I detail the infrastructure in place for the overhaul, let me put into context, Gemcave provide custom crypto tech for blockchain development including their own project, Gemcave Token. The overhaul of the GemCave ecosystem heavily involves changes to GemCave and its tokenomics. - Gemcave Website is being updated in a major way. We are completely revamping the main page to be the face of the GemCave Ecosystem.Â  Â  > The listing site will now be of domain name Listing.gemcave.org and will have a number of new updates!Â  Â  > The site gemcave.org will be the face of the GemCave ecosystem- Ad campaign on BSC-scan is in the works via Coinzilla adsÂ  Â  > We have 2 Ad banners going live - filling both available Ad banner slots on BSC-Scan!- A structured Monthly GemCave listing site competition with a Duck Race concluding each competition with a structured prize system for top 5 voters, Prizes include:Â  Â  > Featuring in our gaming platform (1st, 2nd, 3rd place)Â  Â  > Partnership announcements on social platforms, Â  Â  > Occupying the sponsored slot on the listing site (1st place)Â  Â  > Mutual AMAs (1-5 place) Â  Â  > Discounts on Gemcave Services (varied)The listing site competition will have a number of - A massive restructuring of the tax system with greatly reduced taxes across the boardÂ  Â  > The website will state the exact taxes when updated. Â  Â  > Knowing our big holders are solid diamond handed investors gives us great confidence in this move. Â  Â  > This is a HUGE incentive for new investors to invest in GemCave TokenÂ  Â  > These new tax rates will remain indefinitely.- Staking update! There is a reason why you cannot stake any further coins - Because the current range of staking options have now expired! Â  Â  > We are very soon going to be running a second set of Staking options with 4 options!Â  Â  > The first 3 options will remain the same, but with significantly increased APY!Â  Â  > A 4th option - BURN staking period where all tokens earned through the staking are burned! ğŸ”¥ğŸ’ğŸ‘‘ğŸ’ğŸ”¥ ğŸ’ğŸš‚ Our Train of Operation ğŸ’ğŸš‚Â  1st Stop - Website Update + Tax restructuring2nd Stop - Staking Update!3rd Stop - Listing Site Update!

comments.author: mervinbunter
comments.body: This project is legit. Active community, active devs, not your typical BSC bullshit. If you want a real project that's evolving check gemcave out for sure.
